course.subject: CENG
course.name: Chemical Engineering Summer Laboratory
course.description: Measurements and instrumentation. Data analysis, error analysis. Safety and risk assessment including PID analysis. Designing, assembling, testing and dissembling selected experimental rigs. Hazard and operability studies. A wide range of process experimentation. Written and oral presentations. Teamwork Training. Language Center Interaction for Report Writing. Instructor approval required for course registration.
course.prerequisites: CENG 2210 AND CENG 2220
